title: Excel Converting a Table to Range

metadata.description: Learn about Excel Converting a Table to Range with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Introduction
content_sections.content: Excel Converting a Table to Range

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Tables can be reversed and converted back to range.
Tables can be converted to ranges by selecting a cell in the table range and clicking on the Convert to Range command.
The command to convert to range is found in the Table Design tab, in the Tools group.
Example - Convert Table to Range
Type or copy the values to follow the example.
Name	Type 1	Type 2	HP	Attack	Defense
    Abra	Psychic		25	20	15
    Kadabra	Psychic		40	35	30
    Alakazam	Psychic		55	50	45
    Machop	Fighting		70	80	50
    Machoke	Fighting		80	100	70
    Machamp	Fighting		90	130	80
    Bellsprout	Grass	Poison	50	75	35
    Weepinbell	Grass	Poison	65	90	50
    Victreebel	Grass	Poison	80	105	65
    Tentacool	Water	Poison	40	40	35
    Tentacruel	Water	Poison	80	70	65
    Geodude	Rock	Ground	40	80	100
    Graveler	Rock	Ground	55	95	115
    Golem	Rock	Ground	80	120	130
    Ponyta	Fire		50	85	55
Copy Values
Convert the range into a table.
Select a cell in the table range (
A1:F16
)
Click the Design Table tab (
)
Click the Convert to Range command (
)
The table is now converted into a range and it no longer has the table options available.
Note:
The cell formatting is kept for the range after the conversion.

★
+1

quiz.question: What is The command to convert to range?
options: found in the Table Design tab
now converted into a range and it no longer has the table options available
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of The command to convert to range is 'found in the Table Design tab'.

quiz.question: What is The table?
options: found in the Table Design tab
now converted into a range and it no longer has the table options available
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of The table is 'now converted into a range and it no longer has the table options available'.

summary: This tutorial covers Excel Converting a Table to Range concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Excel Converting a Table to Range effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Excel Converting a Table to Range and how to apply it in your projects.
